input.title: Input Options
input.description: Parameters for finding and handling input data Modidec analysis.

pod5_path.title: Pod5 folder path
pod5_path.description: Folder with the pod5 files of interest

bam_path.title: Bam file path
bam_path.description: File path to the bam file of interest
bam_path.help_text: Please use a bam file that has been basecalled with dorado using the --emit-moves option and was mapped by mimimap using the --MD flags.

model_path.title: Folder path to classification model
model_path.description: Please provide a folder path to a custom NN model

flowcell_type.title: Flowcell Type
flowcell_type.description: Select the RNA flowcell type you have generated your data with

reference_path.title: Reference path
reference_path.description: Provide a txt file or fasta file with a single transcript reference sequence

start_index.description: Define the start index of reads you want to retrieve from pod5 file for analysis
start_index.help_text: Pod5 files store reads in a sorted manner. You can analyse reads by defining a start and end index.

end_index.description: Define the end index of reads you want to retrieve from pod5 file for analysis
end_index.help_text: Pod5 files store reads in a sorted manner. You can analyse reads by defining a start and end index.

mod_list.title: Modification Dictionary
mod_list.description: A dictionary with the modification information, alternative basenames for modified bases with default: Gm, m6A, Ino, Psi. The dictionairy has to be exactly the same as used during training.

advanced_options.title: Processing Options
advanced_options.description: Advanced options for configuring processes inside the workflow.
advanced_options.help_text: These advanced options do not need to be changed for typical use, but allow fine tuning of workflows for users who want more control over the workflow.

batchsize.description: How many files would you like to process per iteration?

threads.description: How many threads you want to use?
